subject: USA WORLD BANK HEAD OFFICE
body:
USA WORLD BANK HEAD OFFICE
1818 H Street NW Washington,
DC 20433 USA,
Good News,
This is Mr David Robert Malpass the Bank Manager of USA World Bank ,
The reason i sent you this mail today because your name and your email
address was listed on the list of the 2023 scam victims while the
United Nation and the IMF was instructed us to pay a compensation of
$1.500.000.00 USD to the scam victim people in the world luckly your
details was appeared that you scammed from Africa under Fake ID as
bank ,Remember that we are giving opportunity only to transfer the
funds to you within 4 days
 ,So for that is why am trying all my best
to make sure that you received your transfer before it will be cancel,
Note, Since it is your funds compensation 
you do not has to pay any
other fee accept the Bank payment files activation $50 only
 because
the government has paid all the necessary fee to transfer to you in
any choice. Due to i have no more time to delay, I will be asking you
to choose the 2 fastest ways to get this compensation to whill will
below,
1. Sending $1.500.000.00 from our Online bitcoin account to your
bitcoin wallet account Or Through Bank wire transfer to you.
2.By uploading the $1.500.000.00 to ATM visa card and ship to you through DHL.
Finally note that all this ways/process will still cost you $50.00
only for Bank Online security keeping fee and it will be paid by itune
card/Steam wallet  which you need to send immediately to avoid more
delays,
Urgent Reply now
Regards
USA WORLD BANK MANAGER
MR DAVID ROBERT MALPASS
Tel: +1 208-298-9868
Email:usworldbankmanager@gmail.com

subject: Re: USA WORLD BANK HEAD OFFICE
body:
Hello Mr. David Robert Malpass,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I'm not sure how my name ended up on the list of scam victims, but it's good to know that there are organizations like yours working to rectify such situations.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. You mentioned that the United Nations and IMF instructed your bank to pay USD to scam victims. Could you please provide more details about this initiative? How was it decided who would be compensated?

Also, you mentioned several methods of transferring the funds - through Bitcoin, bank wire transfer or an ATM visa card. Could you explain a bit more about these options? Which one would be the quickest and most secure?

Lastly, regarding the Bank Online security keeping fee that needs to be paid via iTunes or Steam wallet card - could you clarify why this specific method of payment is required?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Linda
